page.title: 19KITTY THE GHOST
page.content: Kitty, or Katy, is supposed to be a ghost who haunts the site of the Bridon Fibres Rope Works in Willington Quay that have recently been demolished. The story is that Kitty is a worker who used to work there many years ago. One day, while working in the factory, which was then called R. Hood Haggie, or 'Haggies' as we call it, her hair got caught in a machine which pulled it until her head was cut off by a cutting machine. She is said to haunt the mill every night carrying her head. There is another story that she got pushed out of a train which runs above the ropeworks on a viaduct and the train ran over her, killing her. Some people say that at midnight every so often the train runs again!
